Santiago, the capital, is the largest city. Chile's population is estimated to have grown in 2013 to 17,643,916, and in 2015 to 17.9 million, which makes it the 61st most populous country on earth.

Much of the population of Chile is concentrated in the Santiago Metropolis, which is also the most densely populated region.
